chunks.original_latin:
NOTA LECTORIBUS: Hoc opus (Libellus emendationis) translatum est antequam systema textus interlinearis institueretur. Textus interactivi inspectio non adest pro hoc documento. Ad Latinum originalem et translationem Anglicam separatim videndas, quaesumus repository visitas per nexum infra datum.
https://github.com/wryan14/Latin-Patristic-Texts/tree/main/Patrologia_Latina/vol_31
chunks.cleaned_english_translation: NOTE TO READERS: This work (Libellus emendationis / The Little Book of Correction) was translated before the interactive text system was implemented. The interactive text viewer is unavailable for this document. To view the original Latin and English translation separately, please visit the following repository: GitHub - Patrologia Latina Volume 31 Repository
